questions.question: This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' involvement in a rebellion against a tyrant king on an island in the sky. What is...?
This arc is set in a marine base and features Luffy's attempt to infiltrate the base to retrieve a crew member. What is...?
This arc showcases the history of Sanji and the power struggle within the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This technique, a staple of Roronoa Zoro, involves rapidly slashing at an opponent in a circular motion. What is...?
This power, used by a character known as 'The Magician,' allows for the manipulation of cards. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
